short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current travel time and trend for traffic between two locations.  Great for deciding when to leave work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Specify a start address and a destination address, and Traffic Trend keeps track of the traffic conditions between the two locations.  The current travel time is always displayed in a badge on the extension's icon, and the icon changes color based on the current traffic trend.  Great for deciding when to leave work.
